password.minLengthError: New password must be at least 6 characters

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.warning: This action is irreversible. All your data will be deleted.

settings.title: Account Settings
settings.stopOnReply: Stop AI agents in chat when employee responds
settings.stopOnReplyDesc: When enabled, AI agents will stop responding in this chat as soon as an employee sends a message.
settings.resumeRulesDesc: AI agents will automatically resume responding to new client messages after the selected time.

chat.title: Test Chat
chat.selectAgentPrompt: Select an agent to start testing
chat.selectActiveAgent: Select an active agent from the list below
chat.testModeHint: Use these buttons to test "Stop agent when employee replies" feature without real Kommo integration
chat.noActiveAgentsWarning: You have no active agents. Activate an agent in settings.
chat.welcomeMessage: Hello! I'm {{name}}. How can I help you?
chat.simulationEmployeeReplied: [TEST] Simulation: Employee replied to client. Agent paused.
chat.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this conversation?
chat.voiceNotSupported: Your browser doesn't support speech recognition. Try Chrome or Edge.
chat.voiceMicrophoneError: No microphone access. Please allow access in browser settings.

emptyState.title: Start a conversation with an agent
emptyState.subtitle: Select an agent and ask a question or use the suggestions below

suggestions.tellAboutPrompt: Tell me more about your product and its features
suggestions.helpWithPrompt: Help me create a description for the client
suggestions.findInfoPrompt: Find information about the topic I'm interested in

billing.title: Billing Plans
billing.tooltipLine1: Based on industry data, an average conversation includes 5-8 messages, which usually means about 3-4 responses.
billing.tooltipLine2: This rate was automatically calculated based on your plan price. No additional charges.
billing.instructionsLimit: Agent initial instructions: Up to {{count}} characters
billing.sendMedia: Send images, audio, video and documents
billing.guaranteeText: Try any plan risk-free. If you're not satisfied within the first 30 days, we'll refund your money.
billing.guaranteeSupport: Our support team is ready to help you change plans or cancel your subscription at any time.
billing.faqSubtitle: Find answers to common questions about our pricing and plans
billing.faq1q: Can I change my plan later?
billing.faq1a: Yes, you can change your plan at any time in your account settings. Changes take effect immediately, and the cost will be prorated.
billing.faq2a: Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied with the service, just contact our support.
billing.faq3q: What happens if I exceed my plan limits?
billing.faq3a: If you exceed your response limit, the agent will continue to work, but you'll be charged for additional responses according to your plan's overage rates.
billing.faq4q: Do I need my own OpenAI API keys?
billing.faq4a: No, we provide access to models through our keys. The cost of using models is already included in the plan.
billing.faq5q: Are there additional charges for conversations?
billing.faq5a: In Scale and Max plans, voice features are included. Additional charges may apply only for telephony if you connect your own number via SIP.
billing.gracePeriodWarning: Your subscription has expired. {{count}} days of grace period remaining for payment.
billing.subscriptionExpiredMessage: Your subscription has expired. Please renew to continue using the service.
billing.gracePeriodInfo: After subscription ends, you get 3 more days (10%) grace period for payment

knowledgeBase.title: Title
knowledgeBase.articlesWillAppearHere: Articles added to this category will appear here.

training.rolesSubtitle: Ready-to-use knowledge sets for training agents with professional skills
training.noRoles: You don't have any roles yet
training.noRolesHint: Create a role to combine multiple knowledge sources
training.sourcesSubtitle: Books, methodologies and techniques for training agents
training.noSources: You don't have any sources yet
training.noSourcesHint: Add your own methodologies, sales scripts or other knowledge
training.name: Name
training.author: Author

builtInDescriptions.builtin-messaging-sales: Sales techniques via messengers and social media: message structure, CTA, follow-up, handling silence, closing in chat
builtInDescriptions.builtin-spin: Sales methodology through the right questions: situational, problem, implication, need-payoff
builtInDescriptions.builtin-bant: Lead qualification methodology: Budget, Authority, Need, Timeline
builtInDescriptions.builtin-objections: Objection handling techniques: "too expensive", "need to think", "not now", dealing with competitors
builtInDescriptions.builtin-closing: Alternative, direct, step-by-step, summary closing and working with buying signals
builtInDescriptions.builtin-fab: Effective presentation formula: Feature — Advantage — Benefit
builtInDescriptions.builtin-active-listening: Active listening techniques: paraphrasing, clarifying, reflecting feelings, summarizing
builtInDescriptions.builtin-sales-consciousness: Professional sales mindset: customer analysis, buying signals, behavior rules
builtInDescriptions.builtin-cold-outreach: First contact formulas: AIDA, PAS, BAB. Email subject lines. Templates for LinkedIn, messengers
builtInDescriptions.builtin-sales-funnel-stages: Scripts for each stage: first contact, qualification, presentation, objections, closing
builtInDescriptions.builtin-lead-reactivation: Win-back scenarios, touch sequences, how to write to those who haven't responded
builtInDescriptions.builtin-upsell-crosssell: Upselling techniques for existing customers: upsell, cross-sell, scripts by segment

auth.errorPasswordMin: Password must be at least 6 characters
auth.errorUserExists: User with this email already exists
auth.errorGeneric: An error occurred. Please check your data and try again.

confirmation.defaultMessage: Are you sure you want to do this?

agentCreate.title: Create AI Agent
agentCreate.name: Name
agentCreate.errorCreateFailed: Failed to create agent. Please try again.

basicSettings.defaultNoAnswerMessage: The answer to this question will be provided by your personal advisor when they contact you directly.
basicSettings.roleHint: The role adds professional knowledge and methodologies to the agent's instructions. Configure roles in the "Training Library" section.
basicSettings.instructionsHint: Initial instructions for your agent's tone, style, and responses. You can also add general company information to help the agent respond more accurately.
basicSettings.funnelHint: Select funnels and deal stages where this agent should work
basicSettings.stageInstructionsHint: Configure how the agent responds at each deal stage
basicSettings.stageInstructionPlaceholder: Example: At this stage, send the client the contract for review and answer questions about it
basicSettings.createArticlesHint: Create articles in the knowledge base to attach files
basicSettings.articlesAvailableHint: These articles will be available for the agent to send to the client via messenger or email
basicSettings.channelsHint: Select channels where the agent can respond
basicSettings.categoriesHint: The agent will only access knowledge from these categories.
basicSettings.documentsHint: Upload documents (PDF, DOCX, images, price lists) that the agent can send to clients via chat or email.
basicSettings.dragOrClick: Drag files here or click to select
basicSettings.fileFormats: PDF, DOCX, XLSX, CSV, images (up to 25 MB)
basicSettings.clickToToggle: Click on a document to allow or disallow the agent to send it.
basicSettings.createTaskIfNoAnswer: Create task if answer not found
basicSettings.createTaskHint: Automatically create a task in your CRM if relevant information is not found in the knowledge base.
basicSettings.noAnswerMessageHint: This message will be shown when the agent cannot find relevant information in the knowledge base.

aiModel.title: AI Model
aiModel.description: Choose how smart you want the AI to be. More advanced models cost more.

language.title: Language
language.description: The language the agent will use to respond to users

schedule.title: Agent Work Schedule
schedule.description: Control when the agent responds to incoming user messages
schedule.configureHours: Configure working hours for each day of the week

responseSettings.title: Response Settings
responseSettings.delayDescription: How many seconds to wait before responding. We recommend setting a delay of at least 30 seconds to avoid duplicate responses if the client sends another message while the agent is responding.

memory.title: Memory & Context
memory.longTermMemoryDesc: The agent remembers facts about each client: name, budget, needs, objections. These facts are used in subsequent conversations for personalization.
memory.relationGraphDesc: Build connections between clients, companies, and facts. Allows the agent to see patterns: "Ivan from Alpha-Build, who are partners with Beta-Logistics - our client".
memory.factsCount: Number of facts the agent considers when responding (5-50)
memory.semanticSearchDesc: Search facts by meaning, not keywords. The agent will find "budget limited" even if the client said "not much money".

internalModels.title: Internal AI Models
internalModels.description: Configure models for internal agent operations. These models are used for service tasks and do not affect the main dialog with the client.
internalModels.factExtractionDesc: Model for extracting facts about the client from the dialog
internalModels.triggerEvaluationDesc: Model for determining AI trigger activation
internalModels.chainAiMessageDesc: Model for generating AI messages in action chains
internalModels.emailGenerationDesc: Model for generating email messages in triggers
internalModels.instructionParsingDesc: Model for parsing funnel stage instructions
internalModels.kbAnalysisDesc: Model for analyzing knowledge base content (powerful model recommended)

integrations.title: Integrations
integrations.integrationNotFound: Kommo integration not found. Please create an integration first.
integrations.pasteTokenError: Paste the token in the field above!
integrations.integrationActiveDesc: Enable or disable CRM data usage
integrations.noEmployeesHint: Add CRM employees to sync their calendars
integrations.sendLinkToEmployee: Send this link to the employee. They need to follow it and authorize via Google.

dealsContacts.dataAccessDescription: Choose what data the agent can read and use in conversations
dealsContacts.dealDataHint: Select deal fields the agent can read
dealsContacts.selectFieldsPlaceholder: Select fields the agent can access...
dealsContacts.selectOnlyNeeded: Select only necessary fields. Additional fields add extra context and may reduce response accuracy
dealsContacts.contactDataHint: Select which contact fields the agent can read
dealsContacts.dataInputDescription: Configure how the agent can modify deal and contact data based on conversation context
dealsContacts.dealUpdateRulesHint: Set rules for automatic deal field updates during conversation
dealsContacts.contactUpdateRulesHint: Define rules for automatic contact field updates during conversation
dealsContacts.contactConditionPlaceholder: E.g.: when client mentions their name

triggers.title: Triggers
triggers.subtitle: Perform instant actions...
triggers.name: Trigger name
triggers.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this trigger?
triggers.emptyHint: Create a Trigger to get started
triggers.conditionPlaceholder: Describe the condition in natural language, e.g.: client asks to pay, client asks about price, client wants to cancel order
triggers.conditionHint: AI will analyze the message and determine if the condition is met
triggers.applyToHint: Choose which objects to change the responsible user for
triggers.taskUserHint: If not selected, the deal's responsible user will be used
triggers.emailPlaceholder: e.g.: Send a welcome email with information about our services and manager contacts
triggers.emailHint: AI will generate the subject and body. Email will be sent to the contact's address from the deal.
triggers.attachmentsHint: Files will be sent as email attachments.
triggers.filesHint: These files (images, audio, video, or documents) will be sent to clients with the message.
triggers.webhookUrlHint: URL that will receive the webhook request.
triggers.passToAIHint: If enabled, the webhook response will be passed to the AI Agent to form a response.
triggers.createArticlesHint: Create articles in the knowledge base
triggers.articleWillBeSent: Article content will be sent to the client via the selected channel
triggers.responseMessagePlaceholder: e.g., I processed your request and created a task for our financial team.
triggers.responseMessageHint: Message returned when the trigger executes
triggers.runLimitHint: Maximum number of times this trigger can run in one chat. Set to 0 for unlimited.

validation.stageRequired: Please select a deal stage for the "Change stage" action
validation.userRequired: Please select a user for the "Change responsible" action
validation.tagsRequired: Please add at least one tag

chains.title: Chains
chains.subtitle: Automate sending follow-up messages and executing actions on schedule.
chains.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this chain?
chains.conditionsHint: Choose when to trigger this chain

chains.stageNotAllowedHint: If the selected stage is not allowed in the AI agent's funnel settings, the chain will not start and further steps will not be executed.
chains.skipWhenPlaceholder: e.g., client asked not to write or client no longer needs help, etc.
chains.skipWhenHint: Skip chain when this rule is true (leave empty if not required).

chainForm.skipWhenHint: Skip chain when this rule is true (leave empty if not required).

chainForm.emailHint: AI will generate subject and body
chainForm.instructionPlaceholder: e.g.: ask the client to confirm the order
chainForm.instructionHint: AI will create a personalized message based on this instruction and conversation context.
chainForm.workingHoursHint: Automatic chain steps execute only during specified hours. If time falls outside working hours, execution is postponed to the start of the next working day.
chainForm.runLimitHint: Maximum number of times this chain can run in one chat. Set to 0 for unlimited.

triggerForm.passToAIHint: If enabled, the webhook response will be passed to the AI Agent to form a response.
